mapper.sql: DATA_ID as dataId, LABEL as label, CASE1, CASE2, CASE3, CASE4, CASE5, CASE6, CASE7, CASE8, CASE9, CASE10, CASE11, CASE12, CASE13, CASE14, CASE15, CASE16, CASE17, CASE18, CASE19, CASE20, CASE21, CASE22, CASE23, CASE24, CASE25, CASE26, CASE27, CASE28, CASE29, CASE30, CASE31, CASE32, CASE33, CASE34, CASE35, CASE36, CASE37, CASE38, CASE39, CASE40, CASE41, CASE42, CASE43, CASE44, CASE45, CASE46, CASE47, CASE48, CASE49, CASE50, DELETED as deleted, CREATE_TIME as createTime, MODIFY_TIME as modifyTime, LAST_OPR as lastOpr
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTO_CASE_DATA ( LABEL, CASE1, CASE2, CASE3, CASE4, CASE5, CASE6, CASE7, CASE8, CASE9, CASE10, CASE11, CASE12, CASE13, CASE14, CASE15, CASE16, CASE17, CASE18, CASE19, CASE20, CASE21, CASE22, CASE23, CASE24, CASE25, CASE26, CASE27, CASE28, CASE29, CASE30, CASE31, CASE32, CASE33, CASE34, CASE35, CASE36, CASE37, CASE38, CASE39, CASE40, CASE41, CASE42, CASE43, CASE44, CASE45, CASE46, CASE47, CASE48, CASE49, CASE50, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LAST_OPR) VALUES (#{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case16,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case23,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case24,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case25,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case26,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case27,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case28,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case29,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case30,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case31,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case32,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case33,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case34,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case35,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case36,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case37,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case38,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case39,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case40,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case41,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case42,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case43,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case44,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case45,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case46,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case47,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case48,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case49,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case50,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM AUTO_CASE_DATA
AND LABEL like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
AND DELETED = #{valid}

SELECT cd.CASE1,cd.CASE2,cd.CASE3,cd.CASE4,cd.CASE5,cd.CASE6,cd.CASE7,cd.CASE8,cd.CASE9,cd.CASE10, cd.CASE11,cd.CASE12,cd.CASE13,cd.CASE14,cd.CASE15,cd.CASE16,cd.CASE17,cd.CASE18,cd.CASE19,cd.CASE20, cd.CASE21,cd.CASE22,cd.CASE23,cd.CASE24,cd.CASE25,cd.CASE26,cd.CASE27,cd.CASE28,cd.CASE29,cd.CASE30, cd.CASE31,cd.CASE32,cd.CASE33,cd.CASE34,cd.CASE35,cd.CASE36,cd.CASE37,cd.CASE38,cd.CASE39,cd.CASE40, cd.CASE41,cd.CASE42,cd.CASE43,cd.CASE44,cd.CASE45,cd.CASE46,cd.CASE47,cd.CASE48,cd.CASE49,cd.CASE50 FROM AUTO_CASE c LEFT JOIN AUTO_CASE_DATA cd ON c.DATA_ID = cd.DATA_ID WHERE cd.DELETED = '0'
AND c.TESTCASE_NO = #{testcaseNo}

SELECT distinct d.DATA_ID,d.CASE1,d.CASE2,d.CASE3,d.CASE4,d.CASE5,d.CASE6,d.CASE7,d.CASE8,d.CASE9,d.CASE10, d.CASE11,d.CASE12,d.CASE13,d.CASE14,d.CASE15,d.CASE16,d.CASE17,d.CASE18,d.CASE19,d.CASE20, d.CASE21,d.CASE22,d.CASE23,d.CASE24,d.CASE25,d.CASE26,d.CASE27,d.CASE28,d.CASE29,d.CASE30, d.CASE31,d.CASE32,d.CASE33,d.CASE34,d.CASE35,d.CASE36,d.CASE37,d.CASE38,d.CASE39,d.CASE40, d.CASE41,d.CASE42,d.CASE43,d.CASE44,d.CASE45,d.CASE46,d.CASE47,d.CASE48,d.CASE49,d.CASE50 FROM AUTO_CASE_DETAIL cd left join AUTO_MODULE m on cd.MODULE_ID = m.MODULE_ID left join AUTO_CASE c on c.TESTCASE_NO = cd.TESTCASE_NO left join AUTO_CASE_DATA d on d.DATA_ID = c.DATA_ID WHERE d.DELETED = '0'
AND m.MODULE_ID = #{moduleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTO_CASE_DATA SET DELETED = '1', MODIFY_TIME = #{time}, LAST_OPR = #{userNameEn} WHERE DATA_ID in (${dataId})

UPDATE AUTO_CASE_DATA SET
LABEL = #{label},
${key} = #{value},
MODIFY_TIME = #{time}, LAST_OPR = #{userNameEn} WHERE DATA_ID = #{dataId}
